snippet: GlaxoSmithKline said it was investigating claims of improper conduct, including hiring government-paid physicians to promote its products in Iraq.
abstract: GlaxoSmithKline says it is investigating claims of improper conduct related to its business in Iraq, including hiring government-paid physicians to promote its products.
lead_paragraph: GlaxoSmithKline said it was investigating claims of improper conduct, including hiring government-paid physicians to promote its products in Iraq.

headline.main: Glaxo Starts Investigating Possible Iraq Misconduct
headline.print_headline: Glaxo Starts Investigating Possible Iraq Misconduct
